title: Fix Menu category images for Salad/Soup and remove beer imagery from Drinks visuals

requirements.text:
Update Menu category banner image mapping so Salad/Soup categories use salad/soup-appropriate photos (not drinks), and ensure Drinks categories use juice/cold-drink photos with no beer imagery. Apply this specifically by updating `frontend/src/content/business.ts` category `image` fields and/or `categoryBannerImages` so that:
- "Lawazmat (Salads)", "Salad" use a salad banner image.
- "Soup" uses a soup banner image.
- "Hot & Cold Bar" and "Fresh Juice Seasonal" use a drinks banner image that visually represents juice/cold drinks and contains no beer imagery.
No menu item names or prices may be changed.

acceptanceCriteria: In the Menu UI, the category banner for "Lawazmat (Salads)" displays a salad-related image (not a drinks image).
In the Menu UI, the category banner for "Salad" displays a salad-related image (not a drinks image).
In the Menu UI, the category banner for "Soup" displays a soup-related image (not a drinks image).
In the Menu UI, the category banners for "Hot & Cold Bar" and "Fresh Juice Seasonal" display drinks imagery that represents juice/cold drinks and does not include beer imagery.
No menu item names, descriptions/notes, or prices are modified in `frontend/src/content/business.ts`.

requirements.text: Add the required static image assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and ensure all updated category banner references point to files that exist at runtime (no broken images).

quotes: Salad or soup section ma salad or soup ki photo lgao drink ki nhi or bear ki photo HTA do SB jga sa drink ma juice or cold drink ki photo lgao

acceptanceCriteria: New banner image files for Salad and Soup exist under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the exact filenames referenced by `frontend/src/content/business.ts`.
The existing drinks banner image file used by the drinks categories is updated so it contains no beer imagery and visually matches juice/cold drinks.
No category banner image renders as a broken image icon; if an image fails, the existing `SafeImage` fallback behavior continues to work.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not change menu item names/prices/categories beyond updating category banner image references.
Keep the frontend stack and do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable paths.
Store all new/updated images as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (do not serve images from the backend).
nonGoals: Do not add new site sections or change overall site navigation behavior.
Do not change per-item menu photos/visibility behavior beyond the requested category banner image fixes.
Do not change WhatsApp ordering behavior.
